name: Ninja Runner Mobile
description:
The game on mobile is a bit tough but still nearly the same :)

Movement

Use the arrows to move let and right
Press the red button to jump
Hold the blue button to sprint

Wall Slide and Jump

While holding down the direction of the wall in the air, you will perform a wall slide.
After that, just jump to perform a Wall Jump!


Note: Sprinting when about to wall jump will launch you further out, but not as high, whereas not sprinting will keep you closer to the wall while gaining more height.

Levels:

Level 1: Great Start
Level 2: Hop, Skip, and a Jump
Level 3: Moving On
Level 4: Approaching New Heights
Level 5: Sticky Walls
Level 6: By the Skin of Our Teeth
Level 7: Convenient
Level 8: Sky-High
Level 9: Hippity-Hop
Level 10: Easy?
BONUS Level: Sharp as a Needle

Note: To unlock the BONUS level, you have to get a three-star rating after completing a run (getting 10 or fewer deaths)
